title: SJB MPs to join Galle Face protest
body_lines: Five Samagi Jana Balawegaya (SJB) MPs, Harin Fernando, Manusha Nanayakara, Mujibur Rahman, Kavinda Jayawardena and Hector Appuharmy would join the hundreds of protesters at Galle Face, if need arises.
"We are willing to forget party politics and join the protesters if the need arises," MP Fernando said a shortwhile ago.
"We will back the protesters, especially if the government tries to suppress their rights," he added.
The five MPs questioned as to why a 5th generation (5G) tower was erected at the Galle Face.
They also appealed to the protesters not to get discouraged by the acts of the government. (Yohan Perera)
